author: Slidebean
description:
The man who designed the iPhone is now trying to kill it.

Legendary Apple designer Jony Ive is collaborating with OpenAI’s Sam Altman on a new AI native device aimed at reducing screen time and simplifying tasks.

Early reports describe a minimal, possibly screenless form factor, relying on conversational agents rather than traditional apps.

If successful, this project could redefine personal computing and challenge the dominance of smartphones for the first time in over a decade.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: The iPhone’s designer wants to replace the iPhone
